reviews.text: This is not your average Super 8. I had a king room with a small sitting area. It's pretty modern and clean with minimal signs of wear and tear. There was a robe in the room and a pillow menu! Not expected at a Super 8. Fridge, microwave, coffee maker, safe, iron and board, free bottle of water and a couple of free snacks. The A/C worked great, and there was a ceiling fan. Close to the highway, but I didn't think the road noise was bad. The breakfast was the typical continental hotel/motel fare but did include two hot items - scrambled eggs and some sausage biscuits. Nice flatscreen TV. There was a DVD player in the room and DVDs to check out at the front desk. Wifi worked great.
reviews.title: A Suprising Super 8

reviews.text: The only things I could complain about were the lack of bathroom counter space and that the plastic cover to hold the TV remote control batteries in was missing.
reviews.title: Great Find!

reviews.text: I have traveled to Austin many time because my daughter went to school there, and NOW I am discovering the Super 8???? Great beds, separate sitting area and a refridgerator, what's not to like? The people were friendly and the price was great. I will definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: Very nice staff, great breakfast, wonderful beds and bedding, nice big fluffy towels, big rooms, Nice pool and spa, great service. The only negative is that they need new cushions for the pool furniture. It was torn, faded and worn out. Maybe they are supposed to get new furniture. If not they need to.
reviews.title: Nice clean comfortable rooms

reviews.text: WOW what a hotel. Great pricing for a busy weekend, hotel robe in room, snack basket included in room, and last but not least the Starbucks coffee drink maker for breakfast!!! These are all the reasons why I HIGHLY recommend this great place in a great location with wonderful staff.
reviews.title: SUPERB 8 is what this place should be called!!

reviews.text: Wow, I can't believe this is a Super 8! I'm used to a more bare-bones experience at Super 8s, but not here. From the second I drove in the parking lot I knew it was a different level of Super 8 than most others. The landscaping and exterior appearance was top notch.
reviews.title: Wow, the nicest Super 8 ever!

reviews.text: The gentleman at the front desk was great and the lobby was as nice as hotels costing twice this much. My room was outstanding; whisper quiet, and I mean whisper quiet. NO sounds from adjacent rooms or the hallway! Those who may have read my other reviews know that my absolute top complaint about hotels is the constant door-slamming noise from the hallway. There was literally not a sound once I got inside my room. Being on the bed was like floating and there were great pillows and a laptop tray like those found in Hampton Inns and other much higher priced hotels. The bathroom was super high-end with a furniture-like vanity with a granite top, and the other materials were great. The towels were thicker than ours at home are and there was even a scale! I've never seen a scale in a hotel before. One slight maintenance issue with my room (308) was that the shower head was a bit loose and that caused most of the water to drop straight down instead of shooting out of the nozzle. I held it tight and then it worked, but other than that (and, I could have / should have mentioned it) it was a great bathroom. The huge flatscreen TV had every channel I would ever want and the reception and picture and remote all were great. The wireless internet was super fast and flawless. There was a great looking little swimming pool in the back but I didn't use it.
reviews.title: Above and Beyond!

reviews.text: This is a super deluxe Super 8----wonderful beds with 3 thick pillows per bed, a bathrobe in closet, iron and ironing board, excellent breakfast with Super 8 cinnamon rolls, Texas waffles, cereals, apples, juices, STARBUCKS Coffee machine, tea and more. Snacks provided the first night---we were a little disappointed none the second night but otherwise this Super 8 exceeded our expectations in every way.
reviews.title: Best Super 8 we have stayed in!

reviews.text: I recently stayed here and the hotel EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The location was central, the hotel was beyond anything I expected for a Super 8.
reviews.title: Great Experience
